message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal for you, as it's worth $10,000 to you. Let me know if you're interested!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a limited budget. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and your offer. While I'm willing to negotiate, $9,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let me know what you think.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. I'm really interested in it, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. Can you consider this offer?

Bob, I understand your position, but $8,500 is still too low. I'm willing to meet you halfway on my previous offer, so I'll offer $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's make a deal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $10,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. I'm really interested in it, and I'm trying to stay within my budget. Can you consider this offer?
